about.heading: About Me
about.intro: I am a frontend-focused full-stack software developer specialized in building UI/UX-driven SaaS and internal platforms with modern web technologies.
about.body: I am a highly disciplined, detail-oriented developer with a strong focus on collaboration and continuous improvement. I particularly enjoy working on complex interfaces, internal tools, and products where design and engineering decisions directly impact real users.
skills: Modern Frontend Engineering (JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Angular, Node.js)
